Index (C) » ActiveSupport » CallbackOverloads

Module: ActiveSupport::CallbackOverloads

Defined in:
lib/active_support/overloads.rb

Overview

Overloads for ActiveSupport::Callbacks::Callback so it can recognize Workflow::Callbacks::TransitionCallback, which is duck-type equivalent to a lambda for the present purposes.
